headline: Is Jack Henry’s Rapid Transfers Push Quietly Reframing Its Payments Moat With Banks And Credit Unions (JKHY)?
summary: In early January 2026, Jack Henry & Associates launched its cloud-native Jack Henry Rapid Transfers service and welcomed Coinbax into its Fintech Integration Network, expanding fast debit-rail money movement and stablecoin-enabled payment capabilities for banks and credit unions. Together with Sanibel Captiva Community Bank’s core conversion, these moves reinforce Jack Henry’s role as a technology partner helping regional institutions modernize payments, embrace digital assets, and...
